title: Lost id card
content: What is the process if I lost the id card

comments.body: U got file a FIR and all, really long process
Do you need to file fir in police station

That guy processing it has resigned.. I didn't get mine yet, applied last month.. Lemme know if u get any updates ..

Oh, Here's the link.. create an account and get a online FIR copy. Pay 200 in the accounts section with a letter of request and submit it
https://kspapp.in/ksp/api/elost-reports

https://preview.redd.it/fmpbsbrszvne1.jpeg?width=3072&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=f212ca924f4c3a958d5dd0d245c3cfa6777ebbf7

Here's the process, pay 400 to accounts department , don't forget to show fir copy nly then will they take the money, take the receipt give it to admin office along with stamp size photo , they'll issue temporary id card, take that go to your department admin nd show n then send an email with details mentioned in the photo.
I got mine done on Friday so same process
does it have to be in girinagar police station or can you file in your local police station?
